title: Mini-Ep 41: Gift Giving and Costco Faves
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 41: Gift Giving and Costco Faves
itunes:subtitle: On this week's mini-episode, Kate and Doree hear from listeners about gift suggestions for friends and partners, a emailer lends advice about the struggles of socializing during grad school, and Kate shares her very long list of Costco faves.To l...
description:
On this week's mini-episode, Kate and Doree hear from listeners about gift suggestions for friends and partners, a emailer lends advice about the struggles of socializing during grad school, and Kate shares her very long list of Costco faves.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. All products mentioned on each episode can be found on our website, forever35podcast.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Milk & Honey - Get 25% off your first order when you use code forever25
  • Living Proof - Use promo code forever35 to get a FREE sample of dry shampoo with your purchase
  • Poshmark - Get $5 off your first purchase when you use the invite code DOREESHA when you sign up (it's also Doree's closet name!)


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
